device.label: CCWi9p9215 GPIO
device.description: Digi CCWi9P9215 module gpios device. It collects gpios values into channels managing 31 GPIOs (from 0 to 30), that represents several CCWi9P9215 module gpios.

setting.label: Update rate
setting.tooltip: The number of seconds between each GPIO refresh. (s)

setting.label: Input GPIOs
setting.tooltip: The list of gpios that will be refreshed each configured update rate.

template.label: GPIO
template.tooltip: GPIO to be refreshed each update rate. GPIO number must be between 0 and 30 (both included).

setting.label: Output GPIOs
setting.tooltip: The list of gpios which their state can be set to True (1) or False (0).

template.label: GPIO
template.tooltip: GPIO which its state can be set to True (1) or False (0). GPIO number must be between 0 and 30 (both included).
